content: Your user type has been changed to Guest. Personal files will be deleted in 30 days.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when a user's personal folder has been changed to Guest mode, informing them that their files will be deleted in 30 days. The text appears as a warning notification on the Home page of the application. It should be translated to indicate a clear and concise warning about the impending deletion of personal files.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ֆայլերը' (files) is sometimes spelled 'ֆայլ' (file) in Armenian. While both are understandable, 'ֆայլերը' is more grammatically correct when referring to multiple files.

The word 'ආරාධිත' (aaradita) is a less common and potentially inaccurate translation for 'Guest' in this context. It generally means 'invited'. A more appropriate translation would be 'හමුදුව' (hamuduwa) which means 'temporary' or 'visitor' and aligns more closely with the intended meaning of 'Guest' in a system context.

While grammatically correct, the sentence structure 'ඔබේ පරිශීලක වර්ගය ආරාධිත ලෙස වෙනස් කර ඇත' could be more natural in Sinhala. A more fluent phrasing would be 'ඔබේ පරිශීලක වර්ගය හමුදුව ලෙස වෙනස් කර ඇත' or 'ඔබේ පරිශීලක වර්ගය තාවකාලික පරිශීලකයෙකු ලෙස වෙනස් කර ඇත'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase the first part of the sentence to 'ඔබේ පරිශීලක වර්ගය හමුදුව ලෙස වෙනස් කර ඇත' or 'ඔබේ පරිශීලක වර්ගය තාවකාලික පරිශීලකයෙකු ලෙස වෙනස් කර ඇත'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb 'spremenjena' (changed) does not agree in gender with 'tip uporabnika' (user type), which is masculine. It should be 'spremenjen'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vaš tip uporabnika je bil spremenjen v Gost. Osebne datoteke bodo izbrisane v 30 dneh.
